segments.text: Mom , can I have more allowance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy more books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not ! I'm telling the truth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , it's good if you spend money to buy more books . But $ 100 dollars a week is enough for you already .
segments.speaker: S2
